title: Item Pools
body: When I want to trade essence for champion chest I am  told I have 8 but need 10 item pools. What is an item pool and where is it located?

replies.body: It sounds like you're trying to get one of the mystery champion items? Those will only work if you have at least 10 champions left to buy. If you have less than that you won't be able to purchase mystery champs.
i have 12 champs left to buy, still the same problem happend to me.
yeah but i think they should be 790 rp or more champs to count as champion pool
